inputs.images: Input images for extracting size info and passing to save node
inputs.base_folder: Base folder path, can be relative or absolute path
inputs.date_format: Date format: yyyy=year MM=month dd=day hh=hour mm=minute ss=second
inputs.include_time: Whether to include time in date
inputs.model_source: Model info source: auto=from metadata/external input, manual=manual selection
inputs.manual_model_name: Manual model selection (only effective when model_source=manual)
inputs.model_input: Input from model loader node (only effective when model_source=auto)
inputs.seed: Seed value (manual input or connect external node)
inputs.positive_prompt: Positive prompt (manual input or connect external node)
inputs.negative_prompt: Negative prompt (manual input or connect external node)
inputs.prompt_max_length: Maximum length for prompt folder name
